title: The Daily Social Distancing Show - Trump's Presser Tantrum & Major Mask Shortages
itunes:title: The Daily Social Distancing Show - Trump's Presser Tantrum & Major Mask Shortages
description:
Trevor covers coronavirus news from around the world, President Trump lashes out over a softball question, and Roy Wood Jr. talks to a primary physician about mask shortages.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
